data.name: The Imperial Gatekeeper
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1410980/Serafina_and_the_Key_to_the_Egg/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/


About the Game

Til was one of the soldiers who helped contribute to the Empire's victory in a previous war.

Now, he's been assigned to the newly established bureau that monitors the traffic of incoming civilians.

With a new chapter dawning on his life, Til sets off for his new station!

Features:

  • A Gatekeeper Simulation RPG
    Play as Til, a gatekeeper who must keep the city safe from those who may disrupt its peace. Select from multiple actions when travelers try entering the city to fulfill your mission.

  • Check Travelers' Paperwork
    Check their paperwork carefully to make sure everything is in order.

  • Ask Travelers Questions
    Interrogate individuals who seem suspicious, using their paperwork as a reference.

  • Check for Banned Goods
    Some people may try to bring weapons or other banned goods into the city to cause trouble.

  • Time Limit
    There are only so many hours in a day. Make sure to process as many travelers as you can, or you might lose your comfy desk job.

data.short_description: Til is newly assigned to the traffic control checkpoint between cities. It's up to him to screen all who enter! Test your attention to detail to protect the empire!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The Imperial Gatekeeper contains strong language.
